page.title: 04HEALTH-CARE AROUND TRURO
page.content: {TRELISKE HOSPITAL} _________________ Treliske Hospital is the biggest hospital in the Truro area. Although it is sizeable, the hospital does not provide a casualty accident/emergency service; the City Hospital, near the centre of Truro, is where the closest casualty department can be found. Treliske Hospital usually caters for general illnesses and often important operations. Treliske Hospital was built in the past 20 years on a vast open site on the western edge of Truro. Among the major buildings there are hostel blocks for residential staff, a Post-graduate school, and a separated block housing the Princess Alexandria Maternity Wing.
